import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update Tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/content/tags/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the tag with the given `key`.

You can find more information about tags [here](../../docs/guides/content/tags).

### Locale
The `locale` in the request body specifies which translation should be updated.
The `locale` query parameter specifies which translation should be returned.

The `locale` query parameter specifies the translation that will be returned.
If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](../../docs/guides/configuration).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  from a member of the [`CONTRIBUTOR`](../../docs/guides/content/introduction#global-server-group-contributor) group.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"locale","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"locale":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UpdateTagRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
